Pre-Game Insights: The Minnesota Timberwolves have gone 14-10 against Western Conference opponents.
The Timberwolves rank fifth in the NBA allowing just 108.0 points per game while holding opponents to 46.0% shooting.
The Clippers are 14-14 in conference matchups.
Los Angeles is 3-3 in games decided by 3 points or fewer.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Anthony Edwards scored 53 points in the Minnesota Timberwolves' 119-105 loss to the Detroit Pistons.
The Timberwolves score 109.2 points per game, 1.3 more points than the 107.9 the Clippers give up.
The Clippers average 109.2 points per game, 1.2 more than the 108.0 the Timberwolves allow.
Rudy Gobert is scoring 10.2 points per game and averaging 10.3 rebounds for the Timberwolves.
Norman Powell is scoring 23.6 points per game and averaging 3.3 rebounds for the Clippers.
Others: Minnesota hosts the Los Angeles Clippers.
The game will take place in Minneapolis on Monday at 8 p.m. EST.
